Module moffett.scheduler
Package moffett.scheduler.helper

Class Queries

java.lang.Object
moffett.scheduler.helper.Queries
public abstract class Queries extends Object
Abstract class for executing queries within the database.

      address - Address column
      postalCode - Postal_Code column
      phoneNumber - Phone column
      divisionID - Division_ID column

      SQLException

    • checkAppointmentOverlap

      public static boolean checkAppointmentOverlap(int customerID, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws SQLException
      Method for checking if appointment overlaps with an existing appointment for customer.
      Parameters:
      customerID - integer for selecting all the customer's appointments from appointments table.
      start - LocalDateTime for start of the appointment being created.
      end - LocalDateTime for end of the appointment being created.
      Returns:
      returns true if appointment to be created has an overlap with existing appointment, false if not.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • checkAppointmentOverlap

      public static boolean checkAppointmentOverlap(int customerID, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int currentAppointmentID) throws SQLException
      Method for checking if appointment overlaps with an existing appointment for customer.
      Parameters:
      customerID - integer for selecting all the customer's appointments from the appointments table.
      start - LocalDateTime for start of the appointment being updated.
      end - LocalDatetime for end of the appointment being updated.
      currentAppointmentID - ID of appointment being edited, used to remove current appointment from overlap check.
      Returns:
      returns true if appointment to be updated has an overlap with existing appointment, false if not.
      Throws:
      SQLException

      public static String selectRegion(int divisionID) throws SQLException

      divisionID - integer representing primary key Division_ID.
      Returns:
      returns string containing Division (Region Name)
      Throws:
